name: Rosalie
long_description: The barmaid is a lovely wench wearing a low cut lacey white blouse, beige bodice, and cream colored skirts. She has long blonde hair and deep blue eyes. You notice quite a few of the tavern's male patrons eyeing her with mouths agape.

dialogue.greeting: Hello there! Can I bring you something?
dialogue.default: We have fresh bread and hearty stew today!
